page.title: 15SHOPS AND AMENITIES.
page.content: In our village there are a few shops including a post office/off licence in St.Marys Approach which sells almost everything from sweets to stamps.We also have a recently opened wool shop called 'Unique' it is owned by Mrs.Lister.We have a fish + chip shop on the main road which used to be a butchers,owned by Mr.Thompson who used to have the butchers as well. There are also 2 pubs,1 named the Red Lion and the other named the Wheatsheaf both of them are alongside the A63.We also have a restaurant hotel named the Owl owned by the Price family.It is on the main road next to parkinsons garage.Gateforth Hall Grey Lady Restaurant is another of our amenities,owned by Mr.Barnett who is hoping to turn it into a hotel.
